sentences.en: Dad's flirting with all the ladies, or they're all flirting with him, as usual.
sentences.cn: 爸爸在和所有的女士打情骂俏，或者说她们都在和他调情，跟平常一样。

sentences.en: He is the most horrible flirt that can be imagined.
sentences.cn: 他是个你能够想象得到的最可怕的调情鬼.

sentences.en: I think her the most confounded little flirt in London.
sentences.cn: 我认为她是伦敦最会装腔作势、卖弄风情的小东西.

sentences.en: I want to meet people but there is no place to flirt!
sentences.cn: 我剩下的钱不够搭理上某人.

sentences.en: If this is the way all the Gellers flirt, we don't have a problem.
sentences.cn: 如果盖勒家的人都是这么个挑逗法, 我就不用担心了.

sentences.en: It's embarrassing when they flirt like that in public , ie with each other.
sentences.cn: 他们在大庭广众之中那样调情, 真让人难堪.

sentences.en: Of course she'll flirt with anybody.
sentences.cn: 当然,她对谁都卖弄风情.

sentences.en: See when you flirt with a guy you think, I'm just flirting, no big deal.
sentences.cn: 当你挑逗别人的时候你会想: 我不过和他玩玩, 没什么大不了的.
她是个打情骂俏的老手。

sentences.en: The men she likes are those that flirt with her.
sentences.cn: 她喜欢在她面前无拘无束的男人.

sentences.en: We are trying to flirt with China in order to bring pressure on them.
sentences.cn: 我们为了向他们施加压力,正在试图与中国拉关系.

sentences.en: When did you last flirt with him or tease him?
sentences.cn: 你上次和他调情或挑逗他是什么时候？

sentences.en: Who doesn't know that those two often secretly flirt with each other!
sentences.cn: 谁不知道他俩经常背地里吊膀子 呀 ?

sentences.en: Widows should be old -- so terribly old they didn't want to dance and flirt and be admired.
sentences.cn: 寡妇应当是老年人----老得不想跳舞,不想调情,也不想惹男人们爱慕.

sentences.en: YES - when your partner is around you, you will flirt around with others.
sentences.cn: 从脏水的游泳池里捡宝石:是 — 当你的伴侣在你身边时, 你依然和周围的人调情.

words.tran_cn: 轻浮的；调情的；爱调戏的
调情；调戏；挑逗；不认真的考虑
急扔；调情的人；卖弄风骚的人
调情；玩弄；轻率地对待；摆动

trans.tran_cn: 急投，摆动，调情的人，卖弄风情者，急扔

trans.tran_en: to behave towards someone in a way that shows that you are sexually attracted to them, although you do not really want a relationship with them

trans.tran_cn: 调情，打情骂俏，玩弄，轻率地对待，摆动
